notes: Owned by PepsiCo through its subsidiary Frito-Lay, Kurkure is a popular spiced snack in Pakistan. PepsiCo has faced boycotts in Muslim-majority countries over perceived support for Israel.

Cocomo is a chocolate-filled biscuit brand by Ismail Industries Limited, a Pakistani company.
